template:dummy/components/sidebar.text: Appuniversum Badge Brand Button Button Group Content Form: Label Form: Input Form: Textarea Form: Radio button Form: Checkbox Heading Helptext Horizontal Ruler Icon Link Loader Navigation link Pill Alert Card Data table (draft) Dropdown Modal Power select (draft) Body container Content header Main container Main header Main footer Toolbar

template:docs/atoms/au-badge.title: Badge
template:docs/atoms/au-badge.text: Badge Icon or number Skins Sizes Arguments Argument Description Type Default value @skin Sets the color and background color none / border / brand / success / warning / error / action gray @size Change the size of the badge small - @icon Adds an icon to the badge Find the options here - @number Adds a number to the badge 1 - 100 -

template:docs/atoms/au-brand.title: Brand
template:docs/atoms/au-brand.text: Brand Logo Logo with link Logo with tagline Arguments Argument Description Type Default value @brandLink Adds a link on the logotype url - @tagline Adds a tagline underneath the logotype string -

template:docs/atoms/au-button-group.title: Button
template:docs/atoms/au-button-group.text: Button Button Group Groups and spaces buttons Primary button in group Secondary button in group Large primary button in group Large secondary button in group Inline Can be used as a toggle function. Not functional in this demo. Primary button in group Primary button in group - active Large primary button in group Large primary button in group - active Secondary button in group Secondary button in group - active Large secondary button in group Large secondary button in group - active Tertiary button in group Tertiary button in group - active Arguments Argument Description Type Default value @inline Removes whitespace between buttons boolean false

template:docs/atoms/au-button.title: Button
template:docs/atoms/au-button.text: Button Skin Primary button Secondary button Tertiary button Size Primary button Primary button Icon, icon alignment and hideText Primary button Primary button Primary button Width Primary button States: alert / disabled / loading Primary button (alert) Primary button (disabled) Primary button (loading) Arguments Argument Description Type Default value @skin Defines the style of the button primary / secondary / tertiary primary @size Set the size of the button large - @icon Adds an icon Find the options here - @iconAlignment Choose the position of the icon, adds correct margin next to the icon left / right - @hideText Hides the button text visually boolean false @width Defines the width of a button block - @alert Adds an alert state to the button boolean false @disabled Adds a disabled state to the button boolean false @loading Adds a loading state to the button boolean false

template:docs/atoms/au-form-input.title: Form: Input
template:docs/atoms/au-form-input.text: Form: Input Normal input Normal input Block input Width Block input Input with icon Block input with icon (default | left aligned) Block input with icon (right aligned) Input Required Input required Verplicht Error Input Normal input Something is wrong. Arguments Argument Description Type Default value @error Add an error state boolean false @width Display the input as a block element block - @icon Adds an icon (using an icon implies the use @width="block") Find the options here - @iconAlignment Choose the position of the icon left / right left

template:docs/atoms/au-form-label.title: Form: Label
template:docs/atoms/au-form-label.text: Form: Label Label Normal label Label required Label required Verplicht Label error Label error Something is wrong. Arguments Argument Description Type Default value @error Add an error state boolean false

template:docs/atoms/au-form-textarea.title: Form: Textarea
template:docs/atoms/au-form-textarea.text: Form: Textarea Normal Textarea Normal textarea Width Block textarea Textarea Required Textarea required Verplicht Error Textarea Normal textarea Something is wrong. Arguments Argument Description Type Default value @width Display the textarea as a block element block - @error Add an error state boolean false

template:docs/atoms/au-heading.title: Heading
template:docs/atoms/au-heading.text: Heading Heading 1 Heading 2 Heading 3 Heading 4 Heading 5 Heading 6 Arguments Argument Description Type Default value @level Defines the depth of the heading (h1 > h6) 1 / 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 / 6 1 @skin Defines the style and size of the heading 1 / 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 / 6 1

template:docs/atoms/au-helptext.title: Helptext
template:docs/atoms/au-helptext.text: Helptext Skin Helptext Helptext Helptext Size Helptext Helptext Helptext As error message Normal input Something is wrong. Arguments Argument Description Type Default value @skin Change the style of the text primary / secondary / tertiary primary @size Change the size of the text small / normal / large small @error Add an error state boolean false

template:docs/atoms/au-hr.title: Horizontal Ruler
template:docs/atoms/au-hr.text: Horizontal Ruler Horizontal Ruler Ruler with normal margins Ruler with large margins Ruler with huge margins Arguments Argument Description Type Default value @size Define the top and bottom margin default / large / huge default

template:docs/atoms/au-icon.title: Icon
template:docs/atoms/au-icon.text: Icon Usage Add your icons to the public/icons folder as .svg. Make sure to export your svg's without fill or stroke colors so we can style these with CSS. Adding icons The appuniversum-symbolset is generated by svg-symbols. Run npm run icons to generate or update the symbolset. Arguments Argument Description Type Default value @icon Pass the svg name to select the icon See below for available icons - @size Pass the svg name to select the icon default / medium / large default @alignment Add margin to the icon left / right - @ariaHidden Add margin to the icon boolean true Included icons add alert-triangle archive arrow-down arrow-left arrow-right arrow-up attachment bin bold calendar check cross document documents download draft export github hierarchal-back indent italic info-circle link login logout manual message nav-down nav-left nav-right nav-up nav-up-down ordered-list pencil plus-text question-circle redo renew reverse-indent search search-folder settings sitemap strikethrough switch upload underlined unordered-list user user-fill user-popup users

template:docs/atoms/au-link.title: Link
template:docs/atoms/au-link.text: Link Skin Primary link Secondary link Icon Primary link + icon (left) Primary link + icon (right) Primary link + icon Active Primary link - active Arguments Argument Description Type Default value @linkRoute The route that is passed to the link route name - @skin Defines the style of the link primary / secondary primary @icon Adds an icon Find the options here - @iconAlignment Choose the position of the icon, adds correct margin next to the icon left / right - @hideText Hides the link text visually boolean false @active Adds an active state and disables pointer events boolean false

template:docs/atoms/au-loader.title: Loader
template:docs/atoms/au-loader.text: Loader Arguments Argument Description Type Default value @size Set the size of the loader small / default / large default

template:docs/atoms/au-navigation-link.title: Navigation link
template:docs/atoms/au-navigation-link.text: Navigation link Navigation link Navigation link active Arguments Argument Description Type Default value @linkRoute The route that is passed to the link route name -

template:docs/atoms/au-pill.title: Pill
template:docs/atoms/au-pill.text: Pill Pill Pill - border Pill - action Pill - success Pill - warning Pill - error Icons Pill - error + icon (left) Pill - error + icon (right) Arguments Argument Description Type Default value @skin Sets the style of the badge default / border / action / success / warning / error default @icon Adds an icon Find the options here - @iconAlignment Choose the position of the icon, adds correct margin next to the icon left / right -

template:docs/components/au-data-table.text: Data table (draft) Wrapper for https://github.com/mu-semtech/ember-data-table Regular table Notulen zitting Nieuwe zitting Small table Notulen zitting Nieuwe zitting Arguments For now, you can only add the class [au-c-data-table__table--small] in the content tag.

template:docs/components/au-dropdown.title: Dropdown
template:docs/components/au-dropdown.text: Dropdown Default Switch profile Logout Left alignment Switch profile Afmelden Right alignment Switch profile Afmelden Arguments Argument Description Type Default value @dropdownTitle Pass the title of the dropdown string - @dropdownButtonLabel Pass name of the dropdown button string - @alignment Position the icon and menu left / center / right center

template:docs/components/au-modal.title: Modal (draft)
template:docs/components/au-modal.text: Modal (draft) Todo Seperate the open button from the modal component Make the modal open/close action available to other components Modal button styles Modal content Action Modal content Action Modal content Action Fullscreen modal Modal content Action Arguments Argument Description Type Default value @buttonTitle Set the title of the open modal button string - @buttonIcon Add an icon to the open modal button Find the options here - @buttonSkin Set the title of the modal primary / secondary / tertiary primary @modalTitle Set the title of the modal string - @size Set the size of the modal default / fullscreen default

template:docs/components/ember-power-sel.text: Ember power select (draft) Styling of https://ember-power-select.com/ Single select Multiple select

template:docs/patterns/au-body-container.title: Body container (draft)
template:docs/patterns/au-body-container.text: Body container (draft) Body container This block will take up all the vertical space left, but will not be scrollable  even if the content is longer than the vertical space that is left. Body container with scroll This block will take up all the vertical space left, and will be scrollable if the content is longer than that vertical space that is left.

template:docs/patterns/au-content-header.title: Content header
template:docs/patterns/au-content-header.text: Content header Arguments Argument Description Type Default value @titlePartOne Top part of the title string - @titlePartTwo Bottom part of the title string - @pictureSize Sets the size of the header picture default / large default

template:docs/patterns/au-main-container.text: Main container (draft) Main container Sidebar Main content Main container with scroll Sidebar Main content

template:docs/patterns/au-main-header.title: Main header
template:docs/patterns/au-main-header.text: Main header Afmelden Arguments Argument Description Type Default value @brandLink Pass a link to the logo URL - @appTitle Pass the header title string - @homeRoute Pass a route for the appTitle link route - @contactRoute Pass a route for the contact link route -

template:docs/patterns/au-toolbar.title: Toolbar
template:docs/patterns/au-toolbar.text: Toolbar Default Primary button Secondary button Secondary link Reverse Primary button Secondary button Border: top Primary button Secondary button Secondary link Border: bottom Primary button Secondary button Secondary link Skin: tint Primary button Secondary button Secondary link Sizes Primary button Secondary button Secondary link Primary button Secondary button Secondary link Primary button Secondary button Secondary link Reverse A very long text that is supposed to overflow when nowrap has not been added to the AuToolbar component. A very long text that is supposed to overflow when nowrap has not been added to the AuToolbar component. Button Arguments Argument Description Type Default value @reverse Reverse the direction of the child components boolean false @border Adds a border and padding to the top or bottom none / top / bottom none @skin Adds a background color tint - @size Adds more padding small / medium / large - @nowrap Aligns elements to the top and makes sure groups, when dealing with longer content, do not push groups into a new line boolean false
